Items.MatterName: Reopening the lookback window to the victims of gender-motivated violence protection law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to domestic violence related calls to 311
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to informational resource for newly married individuals
Items.MatterName: Informational resource for newly married individuals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.2280-A/A.4899-A, which would require law enforcement officers to conduct a lethality assessment in incidents of domestic violence.
Items.MatterName: Require law enforcement officers to conduct a lethality assessment in incidents of domestic violence (S.2280-A/A.4899-A).

Items.Title: Resolution declaring New York City’s commitment to affirm and defend continued access for reproductive rights
Items.MatterName: Declaring New York City’s commitment to affirm and defend continued access for reproductive rights.
